body_html: The error occurs only when there is little free memory, because in such case if cuDNN exceeds the fraction, the GPU is unable to allocate the requested amount of memory. Nonetheless I suspect that the fraction is always (or often) exceeded regardless of the amount of free memory, but it just doesn't result in a fatal error because there is enough free memory.

body: The error occurs only when there is little free memory, because in such case if cuDNN exceeds the fraction, the GPU is unable to allocate the requested amount of memory. Nonetheless I suspect that the fraction is always (or often) exceeded regardless of the amount of free memory, but it just doesn't result in a fatal error because there is enough free memory.
